text: Lan Tianye (; 3 May 1927 - 8 June 2022) was a Chinese actor and painter. He was known for his role as Jiang Ziya in the television series The Investiture of the Gods. Lan died on 8 June 2022, at the age of 95.送别！表演艺术家蓝天野因病去世 ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors Category:20th-century Chinese painters Category:21st-century Chinese painters
title: Lan Tianye
